hr.plavatvornica.zadatak

Class lvHotelAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • hr.plavatvornica.zadatak.lvHotelAdapter

  • public class lvHotelAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Custom Adapter class for generating ListView

    This adapter is filling custom ListView with information from Hotel object. It uses recycled view to save memory, and make app runs smoother. Created by widek on 30.6.2015..

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
        Method that sets objects inside of item_layout.xml and returns recycled view with new information

        Method gets current Hotel object from ArrayList, ImageView and TextView's from View parameter. ImageView and TextView's information are replaced with information from current Hotel object. Method returns view that contains new information.

        Parameters:
        position - Integer value that represents place of object inside ArrayList
        convertView - View objects that is represents current view.
        parent - Group that view belongs. Set as null.
        Returns:
        returns recycled view that is filled with new object values.
